    C

    calculatePotentialScore(int, boolean) - Method in class com.jeopardy.service.ScoreManager
    Calculates the score delta that would be applied for the given question value and correctness, without modifying any player.
    calculateScore(int, boolean) - Method in interface com.jeopardy.service.ScoringStrategy
    Calculates the score delta for a question attempt.
    calculateScore(int, boolean) - Method in class com.jeopardy.service.StandardScoringStrategy
    Applies the standard Jeopardy scoring rule.

    E

    endGame() - Method in class com.jeopardy.service.Game
    Ends the game by: Setting status to FINISHED Logging a "Game End" event with the final outcome Generating a summary report

    F

    findCategory(String) - Method in class com.jeopardy.model.GameData
    Searches for a category by name and returns an Optional result.
    FINISHED - Static variable in class com.jeopardy.model.GameState
    Game has ended and final scores are available.
    forceEndGame() - Method in class com.jeopardy.service.GameController
    Forces the game to end immediately by setting status to FINISHED.

    G

    Game - Class in com.jeopardy.service
    High-level game controller that manages: Game state (players, questions, status) Event logging via GameEventLogger Summary report generation This class provides a simple wrapper around GameState and ties together core actions such as starting the game, answering questions, determining winners, and ending the session.
    Game() - Constructor for class com.jeopardy.service.Game
    Creates a new game instance with: Fresh GameState A unique case ID based on system time CSV event logger Text-based summary report generator
    GameController - Class in com.jeopardy.service
    Central controller responsible for managing all gameplay operations in the Jeopardy application.
    GameController() - Constructor for class com.jeopardy.service.GameController
    Constructs a new GameController: Initializes a fresh GameState Generates a unique case ID based on the clock Creates a CSV event logger tied to this case
    GameData - Class in com.jeopardy.model
    Represents the complete Jeopardy dataset, consisting of multiple Category objects, each containing their own set of questions.
    GameData() - Constructor for class com.jeopardy.model.GameData
    Creates an empty GameData object with no categories.
    GameDataLoader - Interface in com.jeopardy.service
    Strategy interface for loading GameData from an external source.
    GameDataLoaderFactory - Class in com.jeopardy.service
    Factory for creating the appropriate GameDataLoader implementation based on a game data file's extension.
    GameDataLoaderFactory() - Constructor for class com.jeopardy.service.GameDataLoaderFactory
     
    GameEvent - Class in com.jeopardy.model
    Represents a single event occurring during a Jeopardy game.
    GameEvent.Builder - Class in com.jeopardy.model
    Builder for constructing GameEvent instances in a fluent way.
    GameEventLogger - Interface in com.jeopardy.service
    Interface representing a logging mechanism for GameEvent objects.
    GameState - Class in com.jeopardy.model
    Represents the current state of an entire Jeopardy game session.
    GameState() - Constructor for class com.jeopardy.model.GameState
    Creates a new GameState with empty player and question lists, status set to GameState.SETUP, and the current player index at 0.

    Coordinates scoring for players using the Strategy pattern.

    Strategy interface for different scoring algorithms.

    Sets the player's score, as long as the provided value is not negative.

    Sets the scoring strategy used to compute score changes.
    setStatus(String) - Method in class com.jeopardy.model.GameState
    Updates the game status.
    SETUP - Static variable in class com.jeopardy.model.GameState
    Game is being configured (players/questions not yet in active play).
    StandardScoringStrategy - Class in com.jeopardy.service
    Default Jeopardy-style scoring strategy: Correct answer +value Incorrect answer -value This strategy is used by default in ScoreManager.
    StandardScoringStrategy() - Constructor for class com.jeopardy.service.StandardScoringStrategy
     
    startGame() - Method in class com.jeopardy.service.Game
    Begins the game by setting state to IN_PROGRESS and logging a "Start Game" event.
    subtractPoints(int) - Method in class com.jeopardy.model.Player
    Subtracts the specified number of points from this player's score while ensuring that the score never becomes negative.
    SummaryReportGenerator - Interface in com.jeopardy.service
    Interface for components that generate a summary report for a completed or in-progress game.
    systemEvent(String, String, Integer, String) - Method in class com.jeopardy.service.GameController
    Logs a system-level or UI-driven event (e.g., selecting categories, choosing players, loading files).
